name: Bulb n Run
description:
This is my entry for the Make a Maker Jam. The theme is Light.
This is obviously not the finished game. I just like to share my game at the end of every coding session. This is only what I managed to do in the first 2 days.

Controls:
In Playmode:
W/A/D/Space or arrows to move
Press enter to enter build mode ;)
In Build mode:
W/A/S/D/Space or arrows to move
Backspace to change occlusion mode
current occlusion mode can be seen in the top left corner
Klick and drag (LMB) to change the Tiles
Klick (RMB) on the lamps to drag them araound. Klick again to place them.
Press enter to exit build mode
